Yanillian hops are a Farming plant grown at level 16 Farming. Yanillian hops are grown by planting 4 yanillian seeds in a hops patch using a seed dibber.

After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become Yanillian hops. The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the hops at the cost of 1 Basket of tomatoes

Yanillian hops take 60 minutes to mature. An Amulet of nature may be bound to the patch to provide progress on its growth. Once mature, the hops produces up to 35 Yanillian hops at a time without compost and 65 with ultracompost.

Planting the Yanillian hops seeds gives 14.5 farming experience. No xp is given for checking on the hops. If the farmer does not watch the hops path, then disease on the patch may be removed using plant cure. However, if left alone, the diseased patch will die.

Each hop, when picked, gives 16 farming experience. The hops do not grow back after they are picked. The hops may be picked after the plant is completely grown.

'''Yanillian hops''' are a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 16 Farming. Yanillian hops are grown by planting 4 [[yanillian seed]]s in a [[hops patch]] using a [[seed dibber]].

After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become [[Yanillian hops]]. The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the hops at the cost of 1 [[Basket of tomatoes]]

Yanillian hops take 60 minutes to mature. An [[Amulet of nature]] may be bound to the patch to provide progress on its growth. Once mature, the hops produces up to 35 [[Yanillian hops]] at a time without compost and 65 with ultracompost.

Planting the Yanillian hops seeds gives 14.5 farming experience. No xp is given for checking on the hops. If the farmer does not watch the hops path, then disease on the patch may be removed using [[plant cure]]. However, if left alone, the diseased patch will die.

Each hop, when picked, gives 16 farming experience. The hops do not grow back after they are picked. The hops may be picked after the plant is completely grown.
